name: Red Pepper Jelly Glazed Chicken
preparation: Season both sides of chicken breasts with Salt and Pepper. Place on sheet pan lined with parchment paper and roast for approximately 25 minutes.
Heat a frying pan to medium low; melt butter and Red Pepper Jelly. Stir in lemon juice and set glaze aside.
Brush glaze over chicken and place under broiler for 4 minutes. Turn over, apply remaining glaze and broil until crisp and pleasantly browned.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavour with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
